EmailTemplate.subject: Paycard Comparison
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your time today.
I've attached the fee comparison as discussed. This comparison is based upon the most recent Aline Card fee schedule I currently have on hand. You may have a different version provided by ADP. Please let me know if there are discrepancies or you may send me ADP's fees to me, and I'll update the comparison for you.
I have highlighted the areas where one program provides benefit over the other. Once reviewed, and presuming I've accurately portrayed the ADP fee structure, I think you'll have to agree, that the WEX rapid! PayCard provides your employees a far greater benefit when compared to ADP's Aline program.
While a good place to start, fees are only the "tip of the iceberg". I hope after you've reviewed the attached, you'll give some consideration into taking a closer look at the rapid! PayCard offering.
As you suggested, I'll touch base again sometime late next week, and we'll see what, if any, next steps would be appropriate.
Best wishes,
{!User.Name}
